Package nl.qiy.oic.op.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LoadingService
    Services that are exposed through the ServiceLoader
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DecoratingServiceLoaderWrapper<T extends ServiceProviderInterface>
    Since the service loader will have the same patterns, regardless of what service is invoked, abstract that away in this little class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthorizationFlowService
    A generic way to handle the Authorization flow.
    ConfigurationService
    Any instance of an implementation will be different.
    JaxrsClientService
    Any instance of an implementation will be different.
    OAuthClientService
    Enum singleton with convenience methods to make the calls static.
    OAuthUserService
    Handles the OAuthUsers
    SecretService
    ;-) handling secret information
